project_abstract.cdata: The project comprises the first stage of the Borrower's primary road maintenance program and also includes a study of the road transport industry. The two areas with the highest priority of the four into which the country has been divided were selected for inclusion in this stage of the program. Over a four year period 3,300 km of primary roads in these two areas will be rehabilitated and maintained.
